definition: so angry it's unbearable/bitter about unbearable grievances
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: Eric is in a towering rage and plans to sue that weekly.
sentences.chinese: 被爆料上酒店，孫耀威氣不過，打算控告週刊。
